text:
Min Won-sik(July 12, 1886 – February 17, 1921) was Joseon dynasty Korea and Japanese rule under Korean bureaucratcys and politicians, belief pro-Japanese group thinkers.
In 1910 until 1921, he was political rights activity and right of autonomy for Korea under Japanese ruled. he was wanted to Korean peoples is participate in government administration of Japanese. also Korean peoples have right of autonomys.
In 1921 he was killed by Yang Keun-hwan, Korean separatist activists.
